name: Timothy Roughgarden
content: Tim Roughgarden's Homepage Tim Roughgarden Professor of Computer Science at Columbia University. Director, Columbia-Ethereum Research Center for Blockchain Protocol Design. Head of Research at a16z crypto. Research interests: Design, analysis, applications, and limitations of algorithms. Game theory and microeconomics, especially as applied to networks, auctions, and blockchains/web3.
